job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Sift Media is looking for a proven software developer with excellent data science skills.&nbsp; Our bidder makes buying decisions on over 50 billion ad requests per day.&nbsp; Our data science helps us bid on the right users at the right time.&nbsp; Targeting is crucial, but the methods implemented must be performant enough to execute in real-time.&nbsp; If you enjoy cutting-edge technology, *massive* amounts of data, and being part of the small team powering one of the fastest-growing companies in North Carolina, you’ll probably find this interesting.</p><p><br></p><p>QUALIFICATIONS</p><ul><li>BS or MS in Computer Science, Mathematics or equivalent work experience</li><li>Practical Data Science experience</li><li>Experience with machine learning frameworks such as Amazon ML</li><li>Software development experience preferably with a JVM based language (Java, Scala, Clojure)</li><li>Solid experience with query languages</li></ul><p></p>
